body_html:
I was thinking about having some special logic inside my graph which does something different depending on whether there was such an exception or not.
Also, as I have multiple queues in my graph, I could do some more fine-grained handling.
But I see that this requires quite radical changes, and I can also solve my tasks in other ways, so maybe just let's close this.

body:
I was thinking about having some special logic inside my graph which does something different depending on whether there was such an exception or not.
Also, as I have multiple queues in my graph, I could do some more fine-grained handling.
But I see that this requires quite radical changes, and I can also solve my tasks in other ways, so maybe just let's close this.
